definitions.definition: To relate or belong to; to have reference to or connection with; to affect the interest of; to be of importance to.
To engage by feeling or sentiment; to interest.
definitions.example: A good prince concerns himself in the happiness of his subjects.
I’m concerned that she’s becoming an alcoholic.

definitions.definition: That which one is concerned in; one's business.

definitions.example: it's very concerning that our neighbour seems to be crying very loudly these days
Physically, everything is perfect, but concerning your mental state, you have some problems.
